subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The trading deadline is 3 p.m. Thursday, and several officials in the Eastern Conference have said that the Nets are seriously considering their options to trade stars Jason Kidd and Vince Carter.
snippet: The trading deadline is 3 p.m. Thursday, and several officials in the Eastern Conference have said that the Nets are seriously considering their options to trade stars Jason Kidd and Vince Carter.
